SEARCH
Package models

Class Application

java.lang.Object
models.Application
public class Application extends Object
Represents a BTO housing application in the system. Contains all relevant information about an application including applicant details, project information, application status, and processing details.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private String
    applicantNric
    NRIC of the applicant who submitted this application.
    private LocalDateTime
    applicationDate
    Date and time when the application was submitted.
    private String
    applicationId
    Unique identifier for the application.
    private LocalDate
    approvalDate
    Date when the application was approved.
    private String
    assignedOfficer
    NRIC of the HDB officer assigned to this application.
    private String
    assignedUnit
    Assigned unit number if application is approved.
    private LocalDateTime
    lastUpdated
    Date and time when the application was last modified.
    private String
    projectName
    Name of the BTO project the application is for.
    private String
    remarks
    Additional comments or notes about the application.
    private ApplicationStatus
    status
    Current status of the application.
    private String
    unitType
    Type of housing unit applied for (e.g., "2-Room", "3-Room").

  • Constructor Details

    • Application

      public Application(String applicationId, String applicantNric, String projectName, String unitType, ApplicationStatus status, String assignedUnit, String assignedOfficer, LocalDateTime applicationDate, LocalDateTime lastUpdated, String remarks)
      Full constructor for creating an Application with all attributes.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - Unique identifier for the application
      applicantNric - NRIC of the applicant
      projectName - Name of the BTO project
      unitType - Type of unit being applied for
      status - Current status of the application
      assignedUnit - Unit identifier assigned to the applicant (if any)
      assignedOfficer - Officer assigned to process the application (if any)
      applicationDate - Date and time when application was submitted
      lastUpdated - Date and time when application was last updated
      remarks - Additional notes or comments on the application

    • Application

      public Application(String applicantNric, String projectName, String unitType)
      Simplified constructor for creating a new application with minimal information. Sets status to PENDING and initializes timestamps to current date and time.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - NRIC of the applicant
      projectName - Name of the BTO project
      unitType - Type of unit being applied for
